Recipes._comment: Declare if you Want to Craft Golden Apple Saplings | [Default: false]
Declare if you Want to Craft Emerald Apple Saplings | [Default: false]
Declare if you Want to Craft Notch Apples | [Default: false]

Plants Config._comment: Declare if you want to Allow Right Click Harvest on Any Apple plant | [Default: true]
Declare if you Want to Allow the use of Bonemeal on Any Apple Plant (Override Individual Options) | [Default: true]
Declare if you Want to Allow the use of Bonemeal on Apple Plants | [Default: true]
Declare if you Want to Allow the use of Bonemeal on Golden Apple Plants | [Default: true]
Declare if you Want to Allow the use of Bonemeal on Emerald Apple Plants | [Default: true]

World loot._comment: Declare if you Want to Allow lootable Content on Chests | [Default: true]

Apple Tree Gen._comment: Declare if you Want to Allow Apple trees Generation | [Default: true]
Register the biomes to generate Apple Trees | [Default: [plains, sunflower_plains, flower_forest, forest, dark_forest, wooded_mountains]]
Register the chance values to generate Apple Trees | [Default: [18, 16, 1, 6, 7, 12]]

Golden Tree Gen._comment: Declare if you Want to Allow Golden trees Generation | [Default: false]
Register the biomes to generate Golden Trees | [Default: []]
Register the chance values to generate Golden Trees | [Default: []]

Emerald Tree Gen._comment: Declare if you Want to Allow Emerald trees Generation | [Default: true]
Register the biomes to generate Emerald Trees | [Default: [flower_forest]]
Register the chance values to generate Emerald Trees | [Default: [75]]

Biome config._comment: Declare Apple Forest Chance to be Spawned on the overworld | Range: [0.1 - 10.0] | [Default: 0.5]
